choose.when: INSERT INTO members (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_address, user_level, login_approval) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress}, #{userLevel}, '0'); INSERT INTO owners_docs (owner_id) VALUE (#{userId})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO members (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_phone, user_address, user_level, login_approval) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress}, #{userLevel}, '1');

mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM members WHERE user_id = #{userId})
SELECT IF(docs_submitted = 1, 1, 0) FROM owners_docs WHERE owner_id = #{loginId}
SELECT IF(docs_approved = 1, 1, 0) FROM owners_docs WHERE owner_id = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET login_approval = (SELECT docs_approved FROM owners_docs WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId}) WHERE user_id = #{ownerId}
